messages.message: anybody has history on HAS_SIDECAR parameter that is widely used across the deployment pipelines? it occurs to me that this may have been deprecated as none of the services has that flag set to True anymore @shaunak @sudeep

This was introduced with grpc file service when it used to run thrift and grpc container (as sidecar). With grpc move completed and deprecated thrift container this param might be good to deprecate as well. Cc @Xi Cheng to confirm
